text: 22.2 Stt 2.9, Ese 47.12, Jol 3.18, Sek 14.8, Lep 2.7, 21.24, 22.14, 22.19 Kɨlam juwɨl, taun kanɨb nab ak apyapɨl amnak. Ñɨg gol pɨspɨs, mab ñɨbɨl pelpel yenɨgabal okok jakak. Mab bɨd anɨb okok, sub nokom nokom, takan keke anep umɨgan ak mɨdup pulup. Pen mab wɨj anɨb ak, binɨb man keke okok kɨlop gek suŋ lɨnɨmuŋ tek nep mɨdeb.
